DataElement.preferredName: Notification Plan Study Activity Plan Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity that is intended to occur at some point in the course of a particular study that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. The intended period of time for the planned activity as defined by the study. EXAMPLE(S): 6 weeks may be the planned duration for a composite activity that represents the activities occurring during an epoch on arm A.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)
